summary: **Front End Developer** with 10 years of experience, specializing in **frontend development, UI/UX optimization**, and **a11y** across diverse industries (**media, banking, healthcare, IoT**). Expertise in **React, Angular, TypeScript**, and modern frameworks, with proven success in building scalable, responsive web applications. **Proficient in Node.js, Java, and AWS**, enabling full-stack solutions. Experienced in **Agile** environments, mentoring teams, and driving performance and **user engagement** to deliver impactful **business results.**
